Incorrect user or password: pengguna atau kata sandi salah ketik
A report has been logged and a team of b: Laporan telah dicatat dan dikirim, tim pembasmi bug telah dikirim untuk menangani situasi ini.
Password reset not enabled. Contact your: Penyetelan ulang kata sandi tidak diaktifkan. Hubungi administrator Anda.
Enter your email address below and we'll: Masukkan alamat email Anda di bawah dan kami akan mengirimkan Anda tautan untuk mengatur ulang kata sandi Anda.
Enter your new password below: Masukkan kata sandi baru Anda di bawah ini
Password reset. Log in with your new pas: Penyetelan ulang kata sandi. Masuk dengan kata sandi baru Anda
You have requested a link to change your: Anda telah meminta tautan untuk mengubah kata sandi Anda. Anda dapat melakukannya melalui tautan ini:
If you did not request this, please igno: Jika Anda tidak memintanya, harap abaikan email ini.
Your password will not change until you: Kata sandi Anda tidak akan berubah sampai Anda mengakses tautan di atas dan membuat kata sandi baru.
Restart server. Try reloading the page a: Mulai ulang server. Coba muat ulang halaman setelah beberapa detik setelah menekan tombol ini.
Hosting on this site is provided for fre: Hosting di situs ini disediakan secara gratis dan tidak ada jaminan ketersediaan atau keamanan aplikasi Anda.
This facility is intended solely for you: Fasilitas ini ditujukan semata-mata agar Anda dapat mengevaluasi kesesuaian Saltcorn.
If you would like to store private infor: Jika Anda ingin menyimpan informasi pribadi yang perlu diamankan, silakan gunakan Saltcorn yang dihosting sendiri.
Please select a name for your applicatio: Silakan pilih nama untuk aplikasi Anda. Nama akan menentukan alamat ketersediaannya.
Success! Your new application is availab: Berhasil! Aplikasi baru Anda tersedia di:
Please click the above link now to creat: Silakan klik tautan di atas sekarang untuk membuat pengguna pertama.
A site with this subdomain already exist: Situs dengan subdomain ini sudah ada
Four different ways to get started using: Empat cara berbeda untuk mulai menggunakan Saltcorn
Start by creating the tables to hold you: Mulailah dengan membuat tabel untuk menyimpan data Anda
When you have created the tables, you ca: Setelah Anda membuat tabel, Anda bisa membuat tampilan sehingga pengguna bisa berinteraksi dengan data.
Anda juga bisa memulai dengan membuat halaman.
You can skip creating a table by hand by: Anda dapat melewati pembuatan tabel secara manual dengan mengunggah file CSV dari spreadsheet.
If you have a backup from a previous Sal: Jika Anda memiliki cadangan dari instance Saltcorn sebelumnya, Anda juga dapat memulihkannya.
Instead of building, get up and running: Daripada lama, bangun dan jalankan dalam waktu singkat dengan paket yang tersedia
Packs are collections of tables, views a: Paket adalah kumpulan tabel, tampilan, dan plugin yang memberi Anda aplikasi lengkap yang kemudian dapat Anda edit sesuai kebutuhan Anda.
Name: Nama
The Wiki contains the documentation and: Wiki berisi dokumentasi dan tutorial tentang cara menginstal dan menggunakan Saltcorn
The YouTube channel has some video tutor: Saluran YouTube memiliki beberapa tutorial video
You can copy the pack contents below to: Anda dapat menyalin isi paket di bawah ini ke instalasi Saltcorn lainnya.
Choose views for <a href=\"/search\">sea:
Pilih tampilan hasil penelusuran untuk setiap tabel.
Setel ke kosong untuk menghilangkan tabel dari penelusuran global.
Table saved with version history enabled: Table saved with version history enabled
Label: Label
APIs allow developers access to your dat: APIs allow developers access to your data without using a user interface
Fields define the columns in your table.
First, please give some basic informatio: First, please give some basic information about the view.
Views are based on a view template: Views are based on a view template
A short name that will be in your URL: A short name that will be in your URL
Title: Title
The root page is the page that is served: The root page is the page that is served when the user visits the home location (/). This can be set for each user role.
A default value is required when adding: A default value is required when adding required fields to nonempty tables
Please create your first user account, w: Please create your first user account, which will have administrative privileges. You can add other users and give them administrative privileges later.
Views define how table rows are displaye: Views define how table rows are displayed to the user
Tables hold collections of similar data: Tables hold collections of similar data
Role required to access added files: Role required to access added files
The user uploading the file has access i: The user uploading the file has access irrespective of their role
You must create at least one table befor: You must create at least one table before you can create views.
Table saved with version history disable: Table saved with version history disabled
Not allowed to write to table %s: Not allowed to write to table %s
View %s added to menu. Adjust access per: View %s added to menu. Adjust access permissions in Settings » Menu
The view name will appear as the title o: The view name will appear as the title of pop-ups showing this view, and in the URL when it is shown alone.
Please enter the formula for the new fie: Please enter the formula for the new field as a JavaScript expression. The expression must result in a %s type
Fields you can use as variables:: Fields you can use as variables:
Use this to restrict your field to a lis: Use this to restrict your field to a list of options (separated by commas). For instance, if the permissible values are "Red", "Green" and "Blue", enter "Red, Green, Blue" here. Leave blank if the string can hold any value.
Specify the fields in the table to show: Specify the fields in the table to show
If user has write permission. Leave blan: If user has write permission. Leave blank to have no link to create a new item
Label in link or button to create. Leave: Label in link or button to create. Leave blank for a default label
These fields were missing, you can give: These fields were missing, you can give values here. The values you enter here can be overwritten by information coming from other views, for instance if the form is triggered from a list.
The view you choose here can be ignored: The view you choose here can be ignored depending on the context of the form, for instance if it appears in a pop-up the redirect will not take place.
If user has write permission. Leave bla: If user has write permission.  Leave blank to have no link to create a new item
Which related tables would you like to s: Which related tables would you like to show in sub-lists below the selected item?
Do not display the search filter form: Do not display the search filter form
Default search form values when first lo: Default search form values when first loaded
Calculated fields cannot have File type: Calculated fields cannot have File type
Calculated fields cannot have Key type: Calculated fields cannot have Key type
A short string which is the name of your: A short string which is the name of your site
Select a publicly accessible image file: Select a publicly accessible image file
The URL at which your site is available. For instance, https://example.com/
Allow users to sign up for a new user ac: Allow users to sign up for a new user account
Show the login link in the menu: Show the login link in the menu
Allow users to request a password reset: Allow users to request a password reset email. Email must be configured.
The host address of your SMTP server. Fo: The host address of your SMTP server. For instance, smtp.postmarkapp.com
Disable JS/CSS asset caching, show full: Disable JS/CSS asset caching, show full error to user on crash, enable editing field type
Print all SQL statements to the standard: Print all SQL statements to the standard output
The email address from which emails are: The email address from which emails are sent. For instance, hello@saltcorn.com
Is the connection to the SMTP server ove: Is the connection to the SMTP server over a secure transport protocol?
Are you sure you want to delete %s?: Are you sure you want to delete %s?
A view to show to new users: A view to show to new users
Functions you can use (in addition to st: Functions you can use (in addition to standard JavaScript functions):
A view with this name already exists: A view with this name already exists
Action %s run successfully with no conso: Action %s run successfully with no console output
Error message when regular expression do: Error message when regular expression does not match
Cannot remove plugin: views %s depend on: Cannot remove plugin: views %s depend on it
Create an SQL view in the database with: Create an SQL view in the database with the fields in this list
Requests to render this view directly wi: Requests to render this view directly will instead show the chosen page, if any. The chosen page should embed this view. Use this to decorate the view with additional elements.
This will delete <strong>EVERYTHING</str: This will delete EVERYTHING in the selected categories
Restart required for changes to take eff: Restart required for changes to take effect. Restart server from the Admin page.
Email with password reset link sent: Email with password reset link sent
Skip this section if you do not want to: Skip this section if you do not want to set the page title
LetsEncrypt SSL enabled. Restart for cha: LetsEncrypt SSL enabled. Restart for changes to take effect.
Page %s added to menu. Adjust access per: Page %s added to menu. Adjust access permissions in Settings » Menu
A view with the login form: A view with the login form
A view with the signup form: A view with the signup form
The user referred to in this field will: The user referred to in this field will be the owner of the row
An upgrade to Saltcorn is available! Cur: An upgrade to Saltcorn is available! Current version: %s; latest version: %s.
HTTPS encryption with Let's Encrypt SSL: HTTPS encryption with Let's Encrypt SSL certificate
Saltcorn can automatically obtain an SSL: Saltcorn can automatically obtain an SSL certificate from Let's Encrypt for single domains
HTTPS encryption with custom SSL certifi: HTTPS encryption with custom SSL certificate
Or use custom SSL certificates, includin: Or use custom SSL certificates, including wildcard certificates for multitenant applications
Custom SSL enabled. Restart for changes: Custom SSL enabled. Restart for changes to take effect.
You have enabled both Let's Encrypt cert: You have enabled both Let's Encrypt certificates and custom SSL certificates. Let's Encrypt takes priority and the custom certificates will be ignored.
First delete users with this role: First delete users with this role
This is the rank of the user role, lower: This is the rank of the user role, lower role IDs will be able to access more resources.
Saltcorn is <a href=\"https://www.gnu.or: Saltcorn is Free and Open Source Software, released under the MIT license.
The following tables in your database ca: The following tables in your database can be imported into Saltcorn:
There are no tables in the database that: There are no tables in the database that can be imported into Saltcorn.
The underlying individual view of each t: The underlying individual view of each table row
Email sent to %s with no errors: Email sent to %s with no errors
Always use TLS when connecting to server: Always use TLS when connecting to server? If unchecked, TLS is used if server supports the STARTTLS extension. In most cases check this box if you are connecting to port 465. For port 587 or 25 keep it unchecked
A view with the view to be emailed to us: A view with the view to be emailed to users for email address verification
An email has been sent to %s to verify y: An email has been sent to %s to verify your address
Elevate users to a higher role when thei: Elevate users to a higher role when their email addresses have been verified
Emails used for signup must end with thi: Emails used for signup must end with this string
Signups with this email address are not: Signups with this email address are not accepted
The maximum number of characters in the: The maximum number of characters in the string

Not all themes support menu buttons: Not all themes support menu buttons
Select a publicly accessible image file: Select a publicly accessible image file for the menu logo
Select a publicly accessible image file for the browser tab icon
Site identity settings, backup, email se: Site identity settings, backup, email settings, system control and information
Plugin and pack installation and control: Plugin and pack installation and control
User administration, edit roles, user an: User administration, edit roles, user and security settings, SSL certificates for https encryption
Restart required for changes to take eff: Restart required for changes to take effect.
Minimum user role required to create a n: Minimum user role required to create a new tenant
You are trying to create a tenant while: You are trying to create a tenant while connecting via an IP address rather than a domain. This will probably not work.
Show a warning to users creating a tenan: Show a warning to users creating a tenant disclaiming warranty of availability or security
A list view shown on the left, to select: A list view shown on the left, to select rows
The view to show the selected row: The view to show the selected row
Location of link to create new row: Location of link to create new row
A view for users to change their custom: A view for users to change their custom user fields
Base URL domain %s does not match hostna: Base URL domain %s does not match hostname %s
Format for each line: Header-Name: value: Format for each line: Header-Name: value
User should have this role or higher to: User should have this role or higher to upload files with API (uploads through forms are not affected)
If off, only show create view if the que: If off, only show create view if the query state is about the current user
Increase if you expect large uploads: Increase if you expect large uploads
Store sessions entirely in client cookie: Store sessions entirely in client cookies for higher performance
User must have this role or higher to re: User must have this role or higher to read rows from the table
User must have this role or higher to ed: User must have this role or higher to edit or create new rows in the table
The type determines the kind of data tha: The type determines the kind of data that can be stored in the field
Calculated from other fields with a form: Calculated from other fields with a formula
There must be a value in every row: There must be a value in every row
Different rows must have different value: Different rows must have different values for this field
Add more fields to enable edit: Add more fields to enable edit
Track table data changes over time: Track table data changes over time
Description allows you to give more info: Description allows you to give more information about the table
Description allows you to give more information about the view.
Description allows to give more informat: Description of field allows to give more information about field

The action to be taken when the trigger: The action to be taken when the trigger fires

Condition under which the trigger will f: Condition under which the trigger will fire
The user password or application token t: The user password or application token to access SMTP server for sending emails
The port of your SMTP server: The port of your SMTP server
The user name to access SMTP server for: The user name to access SMTP server for sending emails.
The user password or app password to acc: The user password or app password to access SMTP server for sending emails. If your SMTP provider allows to create app password for using from application We recommends to use app password instead of user password.
Tick the boxes for the fields that shoul: Tick the boxes for the fields that should be jointly unique
Use this link to revisit your applicatio: Use this link to revisit your application at any time.
To login to a previously created applica: To login to a previously created application, go to:
Alternative destinations if formula eval: Alternative destinations if formula evaluates to true
This is the view to which the user will: This is the view to which the user will be sent when the form is submitted, unless a formula below is true.
You can send the user to an different vi: You can send the user to an different view depending on the day the user has submitted. Ignore this option if you always want to send the user to the same destination
Source of plugin for install. Few option: Source of plugin for install. Few options:npm - download from npm repository,local - get from local file system,github - download from github,git - get from git
For npm - name of npm package, e.g. @sal: For npm - name of npm package, e.g. @saltcorn/html or saltcorn-gantt, check at npmjs.com, for local - absolute path to plugin folder in file system, e.g.C:\gitsrc\any-bootstrap-theme\, for github - name of github project.
Version of plugin, latest is default val: Version of plugin, latest is default value
User must have this role or higher to ma: User must have this role or higher to make API call for action (trigger)
This is a translation of a different fie: This is a translation of a different field in a different language
Event type which runs the trigger: Event type which runs the trigger
The field for the message content on the: The field for the message content on the table for messages
The field for the sender user id on the: The field for the sender user id on the table for messages
The field for the participant user id: The field for the participant user id
A view to show individual messages, or t: A view to show individual messages, or the field for the message content on the table for messages
The relationship to the table of individ: The relationship to the table of individual messages
The view to show an individual message: The view to show an individual message
The view to enter a new message: The view to enter a new message
The field for the participant's last rea: The field for the participant's last read message, of type Key to message table
User is treated as owner if true. In sco: User is treated as owner if true. In scope:
Not all themes support all locations: Not all themes support all locations
Library: component assemblies that can b: Library: component assemblies that can be used in the builder
Images and other files for download: Images and other files for download
Pages are the web pages of your applicat: Pages are the web pages of your application built with drag-and-drop builder. They have static content, and by embedding views, dynamic content.
Views display data from tables. A view i: Views display data from tables. A view is a view template applied to a table, with configuration.
Tables organise data by fields and rows.
Pages are the web pages of your applicat: Pages are the web pages of your application built with a drag-and-drop builder. They have static content, and by embedding views, dynamic content.
Triggers run actions in response to even: Triggers run actions in response to events.
Set to 0 for expiration at the end of br: Set to 0 for expiration at the end of browser session
Table %s forgotten. You can now discover: Table %s forgotten. You can now discover it.
Number of columns (1-12) allocated to th: Number of columns (1-12) allocated to the list view
Copy site structure for new tenants from: Copy site structure for new tenants from this tenant
Use this link: <a href=\"%s\">%s</a> to: Use this link: %s to revisit your application at any time.
Use Amazon S3 (or compatible) service to: Use Amazon S3 (or compatible) service to store files. If disabled, Saltcorn uses local disk. WARNING: Changing this may break your uploaded files!
Name you selected for your S3 bucket in: Name you selected for your S3 bucket in AWS.
Prefix you selected for your S3 bucket i: Prefix you selected for your S3 bucket in AWS.
Hostname of your S3 Compatible Storage p: Hostname of your S3 Compatible Storage provider. Defaults to 's3.amazonaws.com'.
AWS region you selected when creating yo: AWS region you selected when creating your S3 bucket. Default ti 'us-east-1'.
Only required if you do not want to auth: Only required if you do not want to authenticate to S3 using an IAM role. Enter the Access Key ID provided by your Amazon EC2 administrator.
The secret access key associated with yo: The secret access key associated with your Amazon S3 Access Key ID.
Connect to Amazon S3 (or compatible) sec: Connect to Amazon S3 (or compatible) securely.
If specified, only include in menu rows: If specified, only include in menu rows that evaluate to true
Optional. String type with options, each: Optional. String type with options, each of which will become a menu section
User should have this role or higher to: User should have this role or higher to generate API keys in their user settings
Only include rows where this formula is: Only include rows where this formula is true
Field that can be used for a prettier UR: Field that can be used for a prettier URL structure
Setup two-factor authentication with Tim: Setup two-factor authentication with Time-based One-Time Password (TOTP)
1. Scan this QR code in your Authenticat: 1. Scan this QR code in your Authenticator app
2. Enter the six-digit code generated in: 2. Enter the six-digit code generated in your Authenticator app
Two-factor authentication with Time-base: Two-factor authentication with Time-based One-Time Password enabled
Two-factor authentication with Time-based One-Time Password disabled
Do not display a column if it contains e: Do not display a column if it contains entirely missing values
Enter your two-factor code in order to d: Enter your two-factor code in order to disable it
Allow the user to enter a new key that i: Allow the user to enter a new key that is not in the schema
If the parent row is deleted, automatica: If the parent row is deleted, automatically delete the child rows.
Cannot install unsafe plugins on subdoma: Cannot install unsafe plugins on subdomain tenants
This is the view to which the user will: This is the view to which the user will be sent when the form is submitted. The view you specify here can be ignored depending on the context of the form, for instance if it appears in a pop-up the redirect will not take place.
Deleting a row will also delete the file: Menghapus baris juga akan menghapus berkas yang dirujuk oleh kolom ini
Channels to create events for. Separate: Channel untuk membuat acara. Pisahkan dengan koma; kosongkan untuk semua
Delete old backup files in this director: Hapus berkas pencadangan lama dalam direktori ini setelah jumlah hari yang ditentukan
No errors detected during configuration: Tidak ada kesalahan terdeteksi selama pemeriksaan konfigurasi
Please select at least one platform (and: Silakan pilih setidaknya satu platform (android atau iOS).
Snapshot will be made every hour if ther: Snapshot akan dibuat setiap jam jika ada perubahan
The view pattern sets the foundation of: Pola tampilan mengatur dasar bagaimana tampilan berhubungan dengan tabel dan perilaku tampilan
Views display data from tables. A view i: Tampilan menampilkan data dari tabel. Sebuah tampilan adalah pola tampilan yang diterapkan pada tabel, dengan konfigurasi.
Source of module for install. Few option: Sumber modul untuk instalasi. Beberapa opsi: npm - unduh dari repositori npm, local - dapatkan dari sistem berkas lokal, github - unduh dari github, git - dapatkan dari git
Version of module, latest is default val: Versi modul, terbaru adalah nilai default
For npm - name of npm package, e.g. @sal: For npm - name of npm package, e.g. @saltcorn/html or saltcorn-gantt, check at npmjs.com, for local - absolute path to module folder in file system, e.g. C:\gitsrc\any-bootstrap-theme\, for github - name of github project.
User must have this role or higher to re: Pengguna harus memiliki peran ini atau lebih tinggi untuk membaca baris dari tabel, kecuali jika mereka adalah pemilik
User must have this role or higher to ed: Pengguna harus memiliki peran ini atau lebih tinggi untuk mengedit atau membuat baris baru dalam tabel, kecuali jika mereka adalah pemilik
Snapshots store your application structu: Snapshot menyimpan struktur aplikasi dan definisi Anda, tanpa data tabel. Tampilan dan halaman individu dapat dikembalikan dari snapshot dari tinjauan tampilan atau halaman ('Kembalikan' dari halaman individu atau dropdown tampilan).
Discover tables that are already in the: Temukan tabel yang sudah ada dalam Database, namun tidak dikenal oleh Saltcorn
Separate paste content into separate inp: Pisahkan konten paste menjadi input terpisah
Hanya build android yang mendukung docker.
Harap masukkan URL server yang valid.
Download one of the backups above: Unduh salah satu cadangan di atas
When prompted to create the first user,: Ketika diminta untuk membuat pengguna pertama, klik tautan untuk memulihkan cadangan
Select the downloaded backup file: Pilih file cadangan yang telah diunduh
Only include rows where this formula is: Hanya termasuk baris di mana rumus ini benar.
Use %s to access current user ID: Gunakan %s untuk mengakses ID pengguna saat ini
Locale identifier short code, e.g. en, z: Kode singkat pengenal lokal, misalnya en, zh, fr, ar, dll.
Is this the default language in which th: Apakah ini bahasa default yang digunakan dalam pembuatan aplikasi?
Provide your own create warning text if: Berikan teks peringatan pembuatan sendiri jika diperlukan
Specify some description for tenant if n: Tentukan beberapa deskripsi untuk penyewa jika diperlukan
If the parent row is deleted, do this to: Jika baris induk dihapus, lakukan ini pada baris anak.
Specifies a filter for what file types t: Menentukan filter untuk jenis file apa yang dapat dipilih pengguna dari kotak dialog masukan file. Contohnya adalah .doc,audio/*,video/*,image/*
Menentukan filter untuk jenis file apa yang dapat dipilih pengguna dari kotak dialog masukan file. Contohnya adalah text/csv,audio/*,video/*,image/*
Specifies a default filter for what file: Menentukan filter untuk jenis file apa yang dapat dipilih pengguna dari kotak dialog masukan file. Contohnya adalah `.doc, text/csv,audio/*,video/*,image/*`
Record all client errors in the crash lo: Catat semua kesalahan klien dalam log kegagalan
Turn on to debug file upload in express-: Nyalakan untuk debugging unggah berkas dalam express-fileupload.
Maximum upload file size in kilobytes: Ukuran berkas unggah maksimum dalam kilobit
Defines how long to wait for data before: Menentukan berapa lama menunggu data sebelum membatalkan unggah berkas. Atur ke 0 jika Anda ingin menonaktifkan pemeriksaan timeout.
Comma-separated list of packages which w: Daftar dipisahkan koma dari paket yang akan tersedia dalam tindakan JavaScript
Your are now logged in as %s. Logout and: Anda sekarang masuk sebagai %s. Keluar dan masuk kembali untuk mengembalikan identitas biasa Anda
Cache-control max-age for public views a: Maksimum usia cache kontrol untuk tampilan dan halaman publik. 0 untuk menonaktifkan
Add relations to this table in dropdown: Tambahkan hubungan ke tabel ini dalam opsi dropdown untuk kolom kepemilikan
You have views with a role to access low: Anda memiliki tampilan dengan peran akses lebih rendah daripada peran tabel yang akan dibaca, tanpa kepemilikan tabel. Hal ini dapat menyebabkan penolakan akses. Pengguna perlu memiliki akses membaca tabel ke data yang ditampilkan.
A view that will be shown only if there: Tampilan yang akan ditampilkan hanya jika tidak ada baris tabel yang akan ditampilkan
Calculated field will be stored in Datab: Kolom terhitung akan disimpan dalam Database
Min role to access search page: Peran minimum untuk mengakses halaman pencarian
We request that you change your password: Kami meminta Anda untuk mengubah kata sandi Anda di %s. Anda dapat mengatur kata sandi baru melalui tautan ini:
We have created an account for you on %s: Kami telah membuat akun untuk Anda di %s. Anda dapat mengatur kata sandi baru melalui tautan ini:
Use this link to access the application: Gunakan tautan ini untuk mengakses aplikasi setelah Anda mengatur kata sandi: %s
Formula must evaluate to true for valid: Rumus harus dievaluasi menjadi benar untuk baris yang valid. Dalam ruang lingkup:
Choose the field to be indexed. This mak: Pilih kolom yang akan diindeks. Ini akan membuat pencarian tabel lebih cepat.
The field that will be shown to the user: Kolom yang akan ditampilkan kepada pengguna saat memilih nilai
String value must match regular expressi: Nilai string harus cocok dengan ekspresi reguler
Only store modules can be installed on t: Hanya modul penyimpanan yang dapat diinstal pada instansi penyewa
A page with this name already exists: A page with this name already exists
Hostname dasar untuk penyewa yang baru dibuat. Jika tidak diatur, akan menggunakan hostname default
If tenant creation is not authorized, re: Jika pembuatan penyewa tidak diizinkan, alihkan ke URL ini
Set a default value for missing data: Atur nilai default untuk data yang hilang
Not scheduled but can be run as an actio: Tidak dijadwalkan tetapi dapat dijalankan sebagai tindakan dari klik tombol
Do not allow the following fields to hav: Tidak izinkan field berikut memiliki nilai yang diatur dari string query atau state
If the parent row is deleted, set key fi: Jika baris induk dihapus, atur field kunci pada baris anak menjadi null
Show a link to open popup contents in ne: Tampilkan tautan untuk membuka konten popup di tab baru
Error shown to user if uniqueness is vio: Kesalahan ditampilkan kepada pengguna jika keunikan dilanggar
User must have this role or higher to up: Pengguna harus memiliki peran ini atau yang lebih tinggi untuk memperbarui atau membuat nilai field
Formula for JavaScript object that will: Rumus objek JavaScript yang akan ditambahkan ke parameter status
Sync information tracks the last modific: Informasi sinkronisasi melacak stempel waktu modifikasi atau penghapusan terakhir sehingga data tabel dapat disinkronkan dengan aplikasi seluler
